short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save pages and read them before they're gone forever.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "Fireman," the Chrome browser extension designed for those who seek a genuine deadline to encourage focused and timely reading. Fireman will help you stay committed to your online content consumption by setting real deadlines for saved web pages.

Features:

1. Easy Saving: Effortlessly add any webpage to your reading list with a simple click, ensuring you can return to it when you're ready to focus.
2. Real Deadlines: When saving a webpage, Fireman asks you to set a specific time frame for reading. This creates a sense of urgency, encouraging you to engage with the content before it's too late.
3. Automatic Deletion: If a saved page remains unread after the deadline, it will be permanently deleted and cannot be added again. This distinctive feature helps you prioritize content and prevents procrastination, ensuring you read what matters most.
4. Genuine Accountability: Fireman's innovative design guarantees that once a webpage has been removed, it's gone forever. This authentic deadline motivates you to stay on track and concentrate on the saved content.
5. Deletion Prevention: Fireman will alert you an hour and five minutes before a pageâ€™s deadline by sending notifications.

Discover the power of Fireman, the browser extension that revolutionizes your online reading habits by enforcing real deadlines. Install now and take control of your digital content consumption.
